Entries.Leah_spouse: I learned all of Robin's techniques last year, but she's always one step ahead of me.
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with Sam. You go on ahead and have some fun.
Entries.Sam_spouse: Molly's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Entries.Elliott_spouse: The aroma drew me here, but the zesty sauce... that truly sealed my fate... *gurgle*$s
Entries.Sebastian: You should check out the fortunes. Not as good as my own, but not complete bullshit either.
Entries.Alex: I played the 'Strength' game too many times and now my arms feel like rubber. I only got up to half orc. Fitting I guess.
Entries.Emily: You know, I would've made a pretty good clown. I guess that's why my name is Jester!
Entries.Leah: I really admire Robin's carpentry skills. I use a lot of the same techniques in my own work. 'Course we use different tools.
Entries.Elliott: I'm trying to get Gus to tell me his mushroom sauce recipe, but he won't budge.
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret mushroom sauce on there.
Entries.Jas: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger!... Revenge will be mine...$u
Entries.Haley_spouse_y2: It's a little funny seeing Fjord stuff his face. He seems to be doing well.#$e#I hope we win the grange display contest this year!$1

Entries.Abigail_spouse: Check out these spiders... They almost look real.$s
Entries.Elliott_spouse: Mmph... I think I've eaten a few too many slices of pumpkin pie. I don't feel so good.
Entries.Abigail: I hate to admit it... but spiders kinda freak me out...$s
Entries.Sebastian: I have no idea how these skeletons are walking... creepy.#$e#It's fascinating though... I wonder if that's what happened to me.#$e#Huh? Did I say something weird again?
Entries.Alex: There's something weird over there. But how do I get to it?#$e#There's gotta be a secret passage somewhere around here. Where's Misty Step when you need it?
Entries.Emily: Do you like the jack-o-lanterns? I carved them myself. One has a dick carved in the back.
Entries.Shane: I wonder if that Wizard would be willing to talk to me...
Entries.Jas: There are giant spiders in the maze. I bet I could ride them. All I need is a small saddle!$h
Entries.Shane_spouse_y2: Nott and I are going to go into the maze.$0#$e#We're going slow, though. Go ahead without us!$1
Entries.Haley_y2: Have you seen Jester?$2#$e#Jester! Can you hear me?$2
Entries.Marnie_y2: Did you have a successful year farming, @?
Entries.Shane_y2: You gotta stay close to me, Nott.%noturn$0

Entries.AbbyWin: pause 100/jump Abigail/faceDirection Vincent 3/pause 800/move Abigail 0 -1 0/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Lewis "Here's your prize, Abigail. Enjoy!"/pause 500/move Abigail 0 -1 0/playSound coin/pause 400/move Abigail 0 2 0/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Egg Festival. Thanks for coming, everyone!"/pause 1000/viewport move 1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: I'll be rooting for you in the egg hunt, dear.$h
Entries.Alex_spouse: Ungh... I think I ate a dozen too many hard boiled eggs... There's gonna be some eldritch blasts tonight...$s
Entries.Elliott_spouse: I enjoy seeing you so relaxed, dear.$h
Entries.Abigail: I don't really care about the eggs, I just really like finding shit.$h
Entries.Sebastian: We used to do a rotten egg toss.#$b#Mayor Lewis put an end to that pretty quick.
Entries.Caroline: Beau's always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.
Entries.Shane: Why don't any of these festivals have a book barrel?#$b#I just want a little more arcane knowledge is all.$h
Entries.Elliott: Don't wander too far during the egg hunt... Buddy system...
Entries.Jas: Oh, I don't care about winning the hunt. I just want to collect the eggs.$h
Entries.Event.cs.1862: By combining their collected eggs... Nott and Vincent!$1

Entries.set-up: event1/22 22/farmer 76 17 1/changeToTemporaryMap Forest-FlowerFestival/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Jas false -2 0 0 6 3 1000/advancedMove Vincent false 9 0 0 -1 4 1000/advancedMove Pam true 2 25000 0 -3 4 0 4 25000 -4 0 0 3/advancedMove Haley true 0 1 2 3000 2 0 0 -1 -2 0 3 500 4 500 1 500 2 500 2 0 1 500 2 500 3 500 4 500 0 2 0 -2 -2 0/advancedMove Caroline true 7 0 0 1 1 18000 0 -1 -7 0 3 18000/advancedMove Willy true 2 25000 1 500 7 0 1 500 2 12500 3 500 -7 0 3 500 2 1000/playerControl flowerFestival/viewport player clamp true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear
Entries.Sebastian: I should have worn my fancy boots.
Entries.Alex: I'm just tryin' to remember the moves. I got two left feet.
Entries.Clint: I wonder if Jester would dance with me?
Entries.Emily: Whoo... I'm stuffed. Hey, have you tried the red jelly donuts yet?
Entries.Leah: Hi @. Aren't all the flowers lovely? Evelyn outdid herself.$h
Entries.Shane: Mmm... excellent sauce... *slurp*#$e#Ah, I bet Frumpkin would enjoy this.#$b#*crunch* ...Wow... That's hot.$s
Entries.Jas: Braiding flowers in your hair is good luck!
Entries.Vincent: Nott looks so cool with her flowers. Can I have flowers in my hair too?

Entries.Leah_spouse: It's nice to see everyone once in a while, but mostly I want to get back to the farm. Crowds make me a little uncomfortable.
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: I'm doing my best to not spike the punch.
Entries.Alex_spouse: Hey, I'll take any excuse to come hang out at the beach. This weather is amazing! Really brings me back!
Entries.Abigail: It's tiring to socialize with everyone... I just end up insulting people when I try.
Entries.Alex: Perfect weather for a beach party, huh? Nothin' like it.
Entries.Leah: The soup is never quite strong enough for me... Some spider venom would give it a nice kick.
Entries.Shane: Hmm... This honey could work for my suggestion spell... I should take some for my component pouch.
Entries.Elliott: I woke up late, stepped out of the door and found myself in the middle of all this hubbub!#$e#I forgot that today was the Luau. My memory isn't the uh... best.$h
Entries.Jas: Vincent isn't a very good dancer.

Entries.Abigail: Jester gets real excited this time of year.
Entries.Sebastian: I thought I saw something moving in there... something big, something dark.#$e#Heh! Just trying to scare you, darling.$h
Entries.Alex: They're beautiful... Last thing you wanna do is jump in there though. That is a bad time...$0
Entries.Emily: Beautiful, isn't it?#$b#Sometimes things that are the most beautiful are the things that can hurt you the worst.
Entries.Sam: I wonder if they're poisonous?#$e#Maybe I shouldn't push Molly in the water after all...$h
Entries.Leah: Hey. What do you think jellies taste like?
Entries.Shane: Sometimes you need a night like this to step outside of yourself.
Entries.Elliott: If we keep polluting the oceans, the jellies will surely go extinct. It's already in the process of happening.#$e#What a shame... people have no respect for nature anymore.
Entries.Jas: I love jellies! I hope to eat one some day!

Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Don't worry about me, I know how we can warm up later.
Entries.Alex_spouse: I'll be rootin' for you in the fishin' competition.
Entries.Abigail: What do you think of my snow-goon? I think he looks like Molly.
Entries.Sebastian: Cold? Nah, I never get cold. Fiendish blood!
Entries.Shane: If it were up to me, I'd probably have a cat show at the saloon, instead...
Entries.Alex: Snowmen are okay, I guess. But mostly I'm lookin' forward to the spring.
Entries.Clint: Jester started helping me without any provocation... does that mean something? *gulp*$4
Entries.Emily: Wow, this snowman needs a makeover. Who made this?$h
Entries.Leah: Oh, ice. A beautiful material to sculpt in. We never got much snow back home.#$e#I don't really mind the cold though.
Entries.Elliott: I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#We'll be releasing them back to the Wildmother in the end anyway.
Entries.Jas: Can I eat his nose when we're done?$h
Entries.Pierre_y2: Our family has matching Winter Star sweaters.#$e#Now, if only Beauregard would wear hers...$2
Entries.Evelyn_y2: You never know... this could be the last time I ever make a snowman with Fjord.#$e#Life is short, dear. Make sure to treasure every moment.

Entries.Abigail_spouse: I wonder if I could lick one of those giant canes...
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. Why don't I show you what I'm thankful for when we get home.
Entries.Abigail: Nothing like a piping hot feast on a cold winter's day, huh? Gonna grab some pocket bacon for later.$h
Entries.Robin: Hiya, @. You're welcome to join our table if you need company.$h
Entries.Shane: I'm really hoping I get a spell book this year.
Entries.Sebastian: You ever get a craving to put scrambled eggs down your pants? That's the kind of thing I'm thankful for.
Entries.Alex: Oh, hey there @. I know I'm supposed to be thinkin' on what I'm thankful for... but this time of year just reminds me of all that I've lost.$s
Entries.Leah_spouse_y2: I can't believe Caduceus even tried the cider...$7#$e#I'll come meet you at the table when I can find an exit... I'm starving!
